an4.180:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bhoganagare viharati ānandacetiye.
an4.180:4.6: “cattārome, bhikkhave, mahāpadese desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an4.180:4.7: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an4.180:5.3: ‘sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ—
an4.180:5.4: ayaṃ dhammo, ayaṃ vinayo, idaṃ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4.180:5.5: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṃ neva abhinanditabbaṃ nappaṭikkositabbaṃ.
an4.180:5.6: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṃ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni, vinaye sandassetabbāni.
an4.180:5.7: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ:
an4.180:5.8: ‘addhā idaṃ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4.180:5.10: Iti hetaṃ, bhikkhave, chaḍḍeyyātha.
